p1.title: Hub & Kits
p1.headline: Lights, Switches & Outlets
p1.description: Get the Iris hub and build your ecosystem around it. Or opt for an Iris Kit. The Safe & Secure Kit comes with a keypad, and sensors. The Comfort & Control Kit features a thermostat and smart plug. And the Smart Kit combines them both.

p2.title: Cameras & Sensors
p2.description: Iris can help you keep watch over your home and your loved ones with an extensive offering of indoor and outdoor cameras, motion sensors, key fobs, and more. Get alerts and see what’s happening at home while your away, 24/7.

p4.title: Heating & Cooling
p4.description: Energy savings comes standard with a smart thermostat. With Iris, you’re house will always be at the right temperature. Iris can adjust the thermostat according to the time of day, or even recognize if someone is in the home.
